content: joe s quick and cozy winter scarf this scarf can easily be made to whatever dimensions you want typically i d recommend about 6 feet in length not counting fringe or trim by 7 or 8 inches wide this scarf is worked in long row along the length of the scarf gauge is not crucial for this project sample was stitched with a bulky yarn and a k hook your fabric should be squishy not firm adjust hook size as needed 1 chain until you reach the desired length chain 1 more turn 2 skip first chain then half-double_crochet half_double_crochet in each chain chain 1 turn 3 skip chain in first half_double_crochet half_double_crochet through both loops then half_double_crochet in back loops only for the rest of the row in the last stitch of the row half_double_crochet through both loops chain 1 turn 4 repeat row 3 until scarf reaches desired width then finish off ends can be woven in or left in place to be tied in with fringe in step 5 5 cut sections of yarn 12 inches long and use a small hook to pull them through along short ends of the scarf so that the fringe is 6 inches long when desired quantity or thickness of fringe is reached knot strands of fringe securely and trim any uneven ends 6 enjoy your cozy scarf
